function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited pre-event preparations for disease outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discussion of disease hotspots and prevention indicating potential for disease outbreak.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Simultaneous data collection and analysis may lead to data contamination and bias in interpretation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Combining and synthesizing information without rigorous validation may result in the propagation of inaccuracies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thematic analysis approach may introduce subjective bias and interpretation variability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of relevant literature on smart solutions and technologies for pandemic and cities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential bias in the selected literature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapidly expanding research leading to oversight of relevant literature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of universal definition for smartness leading to ambiguity in implementation and evaluation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on technological dimensions of smart cities leading to neglect of non-physical components","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of diverse smart technologies for covid-19 pandemic response without clear evaluation criteria","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for subsequent waves of the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate measures for absorption of immediate aftermath of the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adaptation strategies to enhance long-term performance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued spread of covid-19 in some countries leading to further waves of infections and lockdowns","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for future pandemics to emerge","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to clinical psychotherapists for marginalized populations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social support for isolated individuals during covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of mental health strategies in pandemic areas","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective communication leading to increased social fear related to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate psychological support leading to negative emotions and psychological distress","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of early and effective management of health emergency in hospitals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived lack of transparency from health and government authorities concerning the severity of the outbreak.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived difficulties in interpreting quarantine protocols and lack of clear rationale\\/guidelines.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low resilience to social threats such as pandemics leading to higher risk of developing psychiatric conditions.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low perception of social support leading to increased likelihood of developing psychological distress and psychiatric conditions.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate supplies during quarantine period leading to anxiety and frustration","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate information from public health authorities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Symptoms related to quarantine reported in 28% of parents relative to 6% of those who were not quarantined.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"9% of hospital staff reported higher depressive symptoms 3 years after quarantine.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher depressive symptoms were reported in subjects with higher rates of quarantine.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of alexithymic traits may reduce psychological resilience in some individuals.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative outcomes from the imposition of quarantine-related anger","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loneliness and boredom from social isolation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological distress due to quarantine and isolation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Worry and fear related to physical symptoms potentially linked to infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social isolation and uncertainty related to restrictions and lockdown measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Distress, frustration, and loneliness due to confinement and loss of social\\/physical contact","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious spread of psychological effects such as depression, stress, anger, anxiety, and insomnia due to quarantine and covid-19 infection.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 epidemic on mental health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological impact of quarantine related to covid-19 infection","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of direct strategy to manage psychosocial issues related to covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 due to unrestricted social activities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological impact of covid-19 outbreak on mental health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring environmental and climatic precursors of disease outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to strengthen public health preparedness, including surveillance and monitoring","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring environmental and socioeconomic drivers of disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dengue importation driven by international air traffic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in intercepting pathogen introduction through air traffic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threat of vector-borne diseases to global public health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
